title: SIT Academic Staff Retreat - STLA

meta.description: An annual offsite event for SIT academic staff to exchange ideas and share information on how the University can enhance and refine education for its students.

text_lines: An annual offsite event for SIT academic staff to exchange ideas and share information on how the university can enhance and refine education for its students.
The SIT Academic Staff Retreat 2025 has been scheduled for 28 May 2025. Please lookout for the calendar invitation for more information.
2019 Faculty Retreat Theme: Communicating in the Professions
2020 Faculty Retreat Theme: Deepening Applied Learning
2021 Faculty Retreat Theme: Aligning Applied Learning
2022 Academic Staff Retreat Theme: Reconnect, Reflect, Refresh: Maximise the Potential of our Learners through an Education that Enhances Value
2023 Academic Staff Retreat Theme: Towards SIT in 2034
2024 Academic Staff Retreat Theme: Towards the Frontier of Applied Learning
SIT Faculty Retreat 2017 Booklet – Technology Enhanced Learning
SIT Faculty Retreat 2016 Booklet – Applied Learning in SIT
STLA organises training throughout the academic year for academic staff to grow their skills.
ALC is held for local and international experts to exchange ideas and discuss applied learning issues.

article_texts:
SIT Academic Staff Retreat
An annual offsite event for SIT academic staff to exchange ideas and share information on how the university can enhance and refine education for its students.
Upcoming session
The SIT Academic Staff Retreat 2025 has been scheduled for 28 May 2025. Please lookout for the calendar invitation for more information.
Academic Staff Retreat Themes
2014 Faculty Retreat Theme: The SIT-DNA
2015 Faculty Retreat Theme: Faculty Advance 2015
2016 Faculty Retreat Theme: Applied Learning
2017 Faculty Retreat Theme: Technology-Enhanced Learning
2018 Faculty Retreat Theme: Assessment
2019 Faculty Retreat Theme: Communicating in the Professions
2020 Faculty Retreat Theme: Deepening Applied Learning
2021 Faculty Retreat Theme: Aligning Applied Learning
2022 Academic Staff Retreat Theme: Reconnect, Reflect, Refresh: Maximise the Potential of our Learners through an Education that Enhances Value
2023 Academic Staff Retreat Theme: Towards SIT in 2034
2024 Academic Staff Retreat Theme: Towards the Frontier of Applied Learning
